title: how to fix connection error on league of legends oce
body: hey guys im kind a stuck on how to fix this problem i try to log into League of legends but it just keeps coming up with unable to connect to server ive looked at many tutorials online have tried nearly everything i think and it still doesnt seem to work and i really wanna play {{champion:78}} please help me {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey Need Wards,

Please try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article, and let me know if that works for you!
